Executing the following command:
/home/apps/heritrix/bin/heritrix -n 
/home/apps/heritrix/conf/profiles/testProfile/order.xml

With the following order.xml config:

<map name="http-headers">
    <string name="user-agent">Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix/1.2.0 
+http://firms.injuryboard.com/)</string>
    <string name="from">crawler@...</string>
</map>

I get the following error:

Tue Feb  1 15:46:41 EST 2005 Starting heritrix
org.archive.crawler.framework.exceptions.InitializationException: You 
must set the User-Agent and From HTTP header values to acceptable strings.
 User-Agent: [software-name](+[info-url])[misc]
 From: [email-address]
: org.archive.crawler.framework.exceptions.FatalConfigurationException: 
unacceptable user-agent or from
        at 
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.initialize(CrawlController.java:299)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.doOneCrawl(Heritrix.java:745)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.doStart(Heritrix.java:491)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.main(Heritrix.java:260)
Caused by: 
org.archive.crawler.framework.exceptions.FatalConfigurationException: 
unacceptable user-agent or from
        at 
org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CrawlOrder.checkUserAgentAndFrom(CrawlOrder.java:393)
        at 
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.initialize(CrawlController.java:268)
        ... 3 more

Is that the correct place in the order file to place the user-agent headers?

Thanks,
